availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Cincinnati, Ohio, carpenter. Maine native. Married to Evaline Jackson. Father to Louisa Jackson, Orelia Jackson, Philanda Jackson, Charles H. Jackson, Elmore W. Jackson, John W. Jackson, David C. Jackson and Ella Jackson. Carpenter in Cincinnati in 1850. Carpenter in Cincinnati in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 10, p. 67A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 10, p. 24.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 5, p. 399B.
Ohio, U.S., Wills and Probate records, 1786-1998, Hamilton County, Ohio, Will Record, Vol 30, 1868-1884, p. 489-92.
